scripts.dev:setup: npm install && npm run db:up && npm run backend:build && concurrently "npm run backend" "npm run frontend"
scripts.db:down: cd db && docker compose down -v && cd ..
scripts.db:up: cd db && docker compose up -d && cd ..
scripts.db:restart: npm run db:down && npm run db:up
scripts.frontend: cd vite-react-frontend && npm install && npm run dev
